archimate:Capability.name: Marketing offer management
archimate:Capability.documentation: A marketing offer is a value proposition of a product, a service, or a package of products and services, possibly with dynamic pricing to drive customer engagements with an organization. A discount voucher, a promotional coupon, free subscription, and free trial software are good examples of a marketing offer. Marketing Offer Management is a digital capability used to create, present, deliver and measure tailored, personalized marketing offers to customers in the digital space.
